title: 6 Men in Congo Sentenced to Life in Prison for Killing of Italian Ambassador

title: The Syrian Refugee Who Has Become Germany’s Youngest National Chess Player at 11

title: North Korea Tests Underwater Drone to Assess Its ‘Fatal Attack Ability’: State Media
description: This photo provided by the North Korean regime, shows what it says is an underwater blast of test warhead loaded to an unmanned underwater nuclear attack craft "Haeil" during an exercise around Hongwon Bay in waters off North Korea's eastern coast on March 23, 2023. Independent journalists were not given access to cover the event depicted in this image. The content of this image is as provided and cannot be independently verified. (Korean Central News Agency/Korea News Service via AP)

title: Australian Prostate Cancer Patients Trapped in Treatment Gap
description: Prostate cancer: A genetic screening test for prostate cancer is being investigated that could predict the disease's aggressiveness and reduce the need for invasive treatments in men who have milder forms. (Justin Sullivan/Getty Images)
